Key-Value Pairs for Bulk Paste
==============================
Copy everything below and paste into the "Insert or update multiple secrets at once" field:

SKIPCASH_CLIENT_ID=1333b59f-f3ef-4d76-92b6-8cd2c24f528b
SKIPCASH_KEY_ID=eaddac8b-b46b-4996-9c1e-8ab5bf618566
SKIPCASH_SECRET_
SKIPCASH_WEBHOOK_KEY=7a189879-5091-4f43-a2cf-a542cf218827

==============================
INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Copy ALL 5 lines above (from SKIPCASH_CLIENT_ID to SKIPCASH_USE_SANDBOX=true)
2. Go to Supabase Dashboard → Settings → Edge Functions → Secrets
3. Click "Insert or update multiple secrets at once by pasting key-value pairs"
4. Paste all 5 lines into the text area
5. Click "Save"

This is the fastest way to add all secrets at once!
